author: Tim Stelloh
title: Some Southern governors begin lifting coronavirus restrictions
description: Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp said Monday that many businesses across the state can reopen later this week, an announcement echoed by other Republican governors who are beginning to lift stay-at-home orders.
content:
Some governors in the South have begun loosening restrictions put in place to contain the spread of coronavirus.
Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp on Monday granted businesses across the state permission to reopen later this week, an announcement echoed by a handful o… [+4387 chars]
